QuestData.Title: In Bloom
QuestData.Description: It is customary for new recruits to be sent on a difficult or sometimes impossible task. I was sent to obtain a black dragon's scale; last year's instructors demanded a feather from a phoenix.$B$BYour lot has it relatively easy. Find me a handful of flame blossoms.$B$BThey grow around here in relative abundance. Oh, right. There will be a gigantic core hound roaming the fields to keep things interesting. Do your best to avoid him.
QuestData.RewardText: So you managed to pass this part of the test without getting yourself eaten by Smolderos or being incinerated by the fire elementals?$B$BI suppose I should congratulate you on ascending the lowest rung of our ladder.$B$BWell... congratulations, recruit!
